page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most people of working age in Witheridge have been able to find employment.Mole Valley Farmers employ eighteen people , a small soft toys factory employ six , the local garage employ twelve and various other small business employ up to six people each. A number of people travel to work mainly to Tiverton , South Molton , or Crediton and Exeter.These people have a variety of jobs ranging from secretarial to engineering.There are very few professional people in the village - the doctor , four vets and a few teachers. The village badly need more light industry in order to attract young people to the area.This age group cannot afford to travel too far to work and tend to live nearer their work.
